review: an excellent metroidvania for a genre that is often represented by the indie market this game has the polish and feel of a aaa title the movement is fun and fluid and the combat poses a satisfying challenge on the hardest difficulty the story isnt groundbreaking but provides a fun journey through persian mythology and a twist or two along the way if youre a fan of the genre i would easily recommend you add it to your list
game_title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown

review: a solid metroidvania with good progression and level design a solid 810  if youre a metroidvania fan and youve played a bunch of them this game will not offer you anything you havent seen already aside from some power ups but its a polished game with above average budget compared to the rest of the genre  i specially recommend not skipping the dlc its the most fun ive had with the game
